components.description:
A bag or purse, used to carry personal items, often doubling as a fashion accessory.

The design of this emoji varies, with most platforms opting for leather-looking styles in brown or orange. Samsung’s design used to be pink, but is now light brown. Twitter’s purple design stands out among the other platforms.

Not to be confused with the smaller and handleless pouch emoji sometimes referred to as üëù Clutch Bag.
components.title: Handbag

title: Handbag

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.
